lead_paragraph: Corey Perry scored his 31st goal of the season and John Gibson made 27 saves to help the Anaheim Ducks beat the Edmonton Oilers 2-1 Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Gibson Makes 27 Saves, Ducks Beat Oilers 2-1
headline.main: Gibson Makes 27 Saves, Ducks Beat Oilers 2-1
